label: Task-4
title: Process stakeholder interview and cover LinkedIn publication
description: The stakeholder (Dinis Cruz) completed the ChatGPT voice interview on 2026-02-10. Raw transcript at: publications/interviews/2026-02-10/v0.1.3__chatgtp-stakeholder__raw-interview.md. Key outcomes: Hugo for site, Journalist repo owns the site, everything open source CC BY, auto-build on push, all roles should eventually publish content there. Dinis also published the interview as a LinkedIn article: 'I Was Just Interviewed by ChatGPT on Behalf of One of My Claude Code Agents' at https://linkedin.com/article/edit/7427021579454230528/. Tasks: (1) Extract action items and route to Architect/Dev, (2) Write a feature article covering the interview process itself _ how Journalist briefed ChatGPT, how voice mode conducted the interview, what this means for agent-human collaboration, (3) Update the Architect on Dinis's preference for Hugo over Jekyll.
